question: Which one of the following Sultan assumed the title of 'Umadat - ul - Niswan' on the coin
explanation: Razia Sultana assumed the title of Umdat - ul - Niswan on the coin. Raziya was also awarded with the title Raziyat - ul- Din. Umdat - ul - Niswan means ' illustrious among women ' and she inscribed this title on the coin issued by her.
